name: UltraMaths
description:
Now a Days Maths Preparation is necessary to beat any kind of competitive exams
so to make that challenge less boring we provide maths practice application in new way of fun ULTRAMATHS
children can harden there maths skills by using this app
Ultra Maths Game Is for people who love maths like crazy
Who Believe in Taking Maths Challenges

Features :

Unlimited Levels Of Ultimate Maths Problems
Great Material UI Design
LeaderBoard To Check Your Scores Throughout World


So Enjoy The application and Gain Ultra Maths Skills
